title: Bug 117695Format specifier has problem.
SR: The first series set format, add the second series, the format also can be applied to it.Steps:Data source:jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://qadb/guiData set: selectfrom dbo.CityTemp1.Create a pie chart,bind the data set2.Go to "Select Data" tab: Category Definition: row["name"]Series 1: row["temperture"]click "0.0", set Prefix: ( Suffix: )3.Click "+", add a series4.View Chart preivewActual Results:1.The second pie chart also dispay ()Expected Results:1.The second pie chart should not apply the format
